name: Default_en
description: The default prompt to create engaging and informative quiz questions based on provided content in English.

input_variables.name: text
input_variables.description: The content based on which the quiz questions will be created.

input_variables.name: numQuestions
input_variables.description: The number of multiple-choice questions to create.

input_variables.name: language
input_variables.description: The language in which the quiz questions and options should be generated.
